Articles.Content:
This is the biggest plane I have yet made. Unfortunately, I have also discovered, by flying this, that there is a limit to how big I can go before my computer is a slideshow.

Anyway, presenting the Titan II! Designed as a long range, manouverable heavy bomber / cargo plane / passanger aircraft, this is the biggest thing to ever come out of Mincespy Industries\' hangar!

It can be modified to carry weaponry! You can even attach small planes to its back! Or, if you fancy an airborne aircraft carrier, that\'s possible too! Simply attach some of Veto Aerospace\'s runway pieces to the back of it!

Anyway, without any further ado, here it is!

The Titan II:

Also, any of you have any ideas how I can improve this and expand further my knowledge/understanding of spaceplane mechanics?
I can\'t seem to get it off the ground. The wings hit the runway then is breaks apart.

I can\'t seem to get it off the ground. The wings hit the runway then is breaks apart.

Try pitching up a little more gently. Turn on ASAS just before the wings hit the runway, and wait for it to get off the ground before pitching up more.
